text: Shensa Saveh Futsal Club () was an Iranian futsal club based in Saveh, Iran. Shensa were the champions of the Iranian Super League and the Asian Club Futsal Championships. == Honours == National * Iranian Futsal Super League ** Champions (2): 2003–04,Iranian Super League 2005–06Shensa Saveh national champion of the Iranian Superleague Continental: *Asia Futsal Cup **Champions (1): 2006Shensa win Asian futsal title * Golden Cup **Champions (1): 2007Shensa Saveh vence Golden Cup == Season-by-season == The table below chronicles the achievements of the Club in various competitions. {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center" |- ! rowspan=2|Season ! colspan=10|League ! rowspan=2|Asia ! colspan=2|Leagues Top goalscorer ! rowspan=2|Manager |- ! colspan=2|Division !
